publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3415# Cathy Peattie: Firefighters' Pay Formula—That the Parliament notes the changes in the duties of firefighters since their current pay formula was established and, in particular, the greater skills firefighters now require, the additional hazards they face and the changes in the workforce on which their pay formula comparison is based, and believes that these factors should be addressed by a new formula for firefighters’ pay.
S1M-3415# Firefighters' Pay Formula (lodged on 23 September 2002) Mr Duncan McNeil*, Bill Butler*

S1M-3415# Firefighters' Pay Formula (lodged on 23 September 2002) Kate Maclean*, Elaine Smith*, Scott Barrie*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mr John Home Robertson*, Maureen Macmillan*, Cathie Craigie*, Helen Eadie*
S1M-3415# Firefighters' Pay Formula (lodged on 23 September 2002) Jackie Baillie*, Pauline McNeill*, Marilyn Livingstone*

S1M-3415# Cathy Peattie: Firefighters' Pay Formula—That the Parliament notes the changes in the duties of firefighters since their current pay formula was established and, in particular, the greater skills firefighters now require, the additional hazards they face and the changes in the workforce on which their pay formula comparison is based, and believes that these factors should be addressed by a new formula for firefighters’ pay.Supported by: Mr Duncan McNeil, Bill Butler, Kate Maclean, Elaine Smith, Scott Barrie, Margaret Jamieson, Mr John Home Robertson, Maureen Macmillan, Cathie Craigie, Helen Eadie, Jackie Baillie, Pauline McNeill, Marilyn Livingstone, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
